A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Does it have problems? Yes. The pacing and editing is sometimes off\, it had some weird effects and moments. But did it surprise me? Yes\, alot! Did I mostly enjoy it? Yes. Did it raise questions and provoke discussion. CERTAINLY YES. Definitely worth to see\, but I also understand why someone might not like it. Lots of bold choices by Rian Johnson.
